logger.doc:name: Log PAS Call
logger.message: #[output application/json --- {logType: 'PAS_CALL', correlationId: vars.correlationId, transactionId: vars.pasRequest.transactionId, quoteReference: vars.pasRequest.quoteReference, timestamp: now()}]

logger.doc:name: Log PAS Response
logger.message: #[output application/json --- {logType: 'PAS_RESPONSE', correlationId: vars.correlationId, policyNumber: payload.policyNumber default 'N/A', status: payload.status default 'N/A', timestamp: now()}]

logger.doc:name: Log PAS Connectivity Error
logger.message: #[output application/json --- {logType: 'PAS_ERROR', errorType: 'CONNECTIVITY', correlationId: vars.correlationId, message: error.description, timestamp: now()}]

logger.doc:name: Log PAS Timeout Error
logger.message: #[output application/json --- {logType: 'PAS_ERROR', errorType: 'TIMEOUT', correlationId: vars.correlationId, message: error.description, timestamp: now()}]

logger.doc:name: Log PAS HTTP Error
logger.message: #[output application/json --- {logType: 'PAS_ERROR', errorType: 'HTTP_ERROR', correlationId: vars.correlationId, message: error.description, timestamp: now()}]
